_buttons.disabledAriaLabel: This button is disabled at the moment

_accordion.ariaRegion: List of expandable sections. Select each button to expand the content.

_gmcq.ariaRegion: Multiple choice question. Select your option and then submit.

_matching.ariaRegion: Matching. Select from lists and then submit.

_mcq.ariaRegion: Multiple choice question. Select your option and then submit.

_narrative.ariaRegion: Slide show. Select the next button to progress.

_slider.ariaRegion: Slider. Respond to the question by selecting a value on the scale and then submit.

_textinput.ariaRegion: Text input. Type your answer and then submit.

_hotgraphic.ariaRegion: Image with selectable areas. Select each button to show more information.

_confidenceSlider.ariaRegion: Answer the question by selecting a value from the range. Once you have done so, select the submit button below.

_flipcard.ariaRegion: This component is a flipcard comprised of flippable cards containing display image. Select the front face image to flip to the back face of these card to display associated text.

_dragAndDrop.ariaRegion: This is a basic drag and drop question component.

_dragndropwithimage.ariaRegion: This component is a multiple choice question. Once you have selected an option select the submit button below

_hotgrid.ariaRegion: Selectable image component. Select each item to show more information.

_stacklist.ariaRegion: This stacklist component presents a list of items. Select the button to access each item in turn.
_stacklist.ariaButtonLabel: Select this button to access the next item in the stacklist.

_tabs.ariaRegion: A tabbed content container. Content can be text, graphic or both.

_youtube.ariaRegion: Media component which displays a YouTube video. Select the play / pause button to watch it.

_hotgraphicAudio.ariaRegion: Image with selectable areas. Select each button to show more information.

_blinds.ariaRegion: This component contains selectable grid items. Select an item to display the associated text.

_accordion-audio.ariaRegion: Accordion. Select each button to expand the content.

_narrativeAudio.ariaRegion: Slide show. Select the next button to progress.

_ppq-audio.ariaRegion: A question component that requires users to correctly position one or more pins on an image.

_list.ariaRegion: This component is a list of items displaying text.

_scenario-audio.ariaRegion: This component displays an image gallery with accompanying text. Use the next and back navigation controls to work through the scenario.

_tabs-audio.ariaRegion: This component is comprised of hidden content panels that can contain text and images. Select the tab item titles to reveal the content panels.

_textEntry-audio.ariaRegion: This question requires you to input your answer in the textbox provided. When you have done so, select the submit button below.

_pageLevelProgress.pageLevelProgressIndicatorBar: Page progress. Use this to listen to the list of regions in this topic and whether they're completed. You can jump directly to any that are incomplete or which sound particularly interesting. {{percentageComplete}}%
_pageLevelProgress.pageLevelProgressEnd: You have reached the end of the list of page sections.
